summary: A rework of what bees of Skyrim calls \"home\".
descriptionHtml:
[center] 

[IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/32883-1-1362618585.png[/IMG] 


[color=red][b]Updated to 1.01[/b][/color]
See \"README\" section for more info.

[size=4][color=yellow]What this thing is all about ?[/color][/size] 

[b]Someone pointed me out that bee hives were unlookable and this is a [u]try[/u] to fix that.[/b]

[b]This little mod includes a fixed mesh for honeycombs and slightly changed meshes for wild hives plus a revised set of textures for both wild and domestic ones.[/b]

[size=3] If you shouldn\'t like it it\'s easy to uninstall through NMM or reading the inner Jacks_Bees_Estate_Readme.txt (found in \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder), if you should like it instead an endorsement it\'s completely inexpensive and would be greatly appreciated, it\'s only another simple mod, as always I don\'t expect too much but ... you already know.. [/size] 

[size=3][color=red]Compatibility:[/color][/size] 

Everything that doesn\'t overwrite the meshes or textures of bee hives.

[size=3][color=red]Notes:[/color][/size] 

1) If you should use HD_textures_DLC_Fix_1_3b you will be asked to overwrite three files, choose yes (sorry but mine\'s look relly better than those). :) 

2) I didn\'t had all the time needed to test everything in real game but Havok tells me this mod shouldn\'t be so bad after all. However please report issues if any, I will try to fix them, real life allowing.

3) This mod also changes some \"effects\" which \"affects\" other istance in the game, more on the readme.

[size=3][color=red]Relyability:[/color][/size] 

It\'s proven it will work until you decide to get rid of it. 

[/center]
author: JackLaVaporiera
